created_at.description: The creation date and time of the object.

updated_at.description: The last updated date and time of the object.

is_active.description: Calculated active subscription is when the subscription is not canceled and not expired.

cancellation_date.description: The date when subscription was canceled.

expiration_date.description: The date when subscription was expired.

buyer_uid.description: The actor of the action, the staff uid.

business_uid.description: The business that the subscription relates to.

purchase_price.description: The purchase price at the moment of the subscription was created.

purchase_currency.description: The purchase currency at the moment of the subscription was created.

payment_type.description: TBD (seperate to two fields - type and frequency) The payment type field defines the payment options available for a offering×ª 'free' - No payment is required; 'one_time' - A single, one-time payment is required to obtain the offering; 'monthly' - A recurring payment made on a monthly basis; 'annual' - A recurring payment made on a yearly basis; 'bundle' - A subscription bundled with another subscription

bundled_from_subscription_uid.description: The subscription uid that this subscription is bundled from

enable_trial.description: Whether this subscription starts with a trial period. Derives the value from the offering.

trial_type.description: How the trial option is managed. Automatic charge - when the trial period ends, automatically start charging as set in the pricing; Manually charge - when the trial ends, the subscription stays active without charging; Expire - when the trial ends, expire the subscription.

trial_period.description: Number of days for the trial period. If not specified or set to 0, it indicates no trial period is offered.

is_in_trial_period.description: A calculated field indicating whether the subscription is still in the trial period or not.
